descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Domantas Sabonis slips a bounce pass between defenders to Oshae Brissett who elevates to flush an uncontested dunk for the Pacers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Sabonis sets up Brissett for the easy slam inside) 2021/10/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Sabonis sets up Brissett for the easy slam inside

videos.description: Tyler Herro uses a stepback to create space and drains a 3-pointer on Malcolm Brogdon to tie the game with just under a minute remaining in the 4th quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Herro laces 3 to tie game late in the 4th) 2021/10/23 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro laces 3 to tie game late in the 4th
